configurable.inline.yacl.description.ren: Adds mod icons next to mod names in item tooltips, usually added by jei/emi
configurable.inline.yacl.description.cha:
Prevent large renders from blocking your chat
1: [item:diamond_sword] 1.5: [item!diamond_sword] 2: [item+diamond_sword]
configurable.inline.yacl.description.app: Allow inline renders to work on display boards.
